index.js

Main file to the experiment interface. Builds a connection to the Model, sets up a LocalKeyController and the view components (one instance each of LayerView, IGView and LView), retrieves tasks from the respective GOLMI endpoint.  Presents introductory and questionnaire dialogs to the user and starts the tasks.

Variables
CONFIG
const CONFIG

model configuration

Functions
start
function start()

Establish a connection to the Model. A client-side listener to the 'connect' event will start the tasks at success.

stop
function stop()

Disconnect the LocalKeyController from the Model to delete the assigned Gripper, then cut the socket connection.

startAudiotest
function startAudiotest()

Start playing an audiosample in a loop similarly to how the IGView will play instructions later.

stopAudiotest
function stopAudiotest()

Stop the looped test audio.

updateProgressBar
function updateProgressBar(
completion
)

Update the displayed progress bar.

Params
completion

Completion in percent (int)
